scripts.release:build: mkdir -p dist/bin && tsc -b --clean && tsc -b --force && mkdir -p dist/bin && cp bin/extract.js dist/bin/extract.js
scripts.release:prepare: npm run clean && npm run release:build && cd dist/ && ts-node ../scripts/publishing/prepare.ts
scripts.patch-release: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm run release:prepare && cd dist/ && npm publish
scripts.patch:dry: npm run clean && npm version patch && npm run release:prepare && cd dist/ && npm publish --dry-run
